title: S16 Ep127: TCT: Watch Me Die: Last Words from Death Row w/ Dr. Bill Kimberlin
itunes:title: TCT: Watch Me Die: Last Words from Death Row w/ Dr. Bill Kimberlin
description:
True Crime Tuesday presents Watch Me Die: Last Words from Death Row with guest Dr. Bill Kimberlin

Dr. Kimberlin returns to True Crime Tuesday to discuss his work and relationships with Death Row inmates, the stories he is told, the impact watching killers face their deaths and shocking revelations convicted killers have shared with him in their final hours.Dave & Tim discuss the intricacies of the Death Penalty and some of the inherent flaws in the system.


Get the book here: https://amzn.to/3BtVj7w

Follow Dr. Kimberlin here: https://twitter.com/BillKimberlin1

And here: https://www.facebook.com/bill.kimberlin.3
